title: Englease.com – E‑Learning Dashboard Platform
description: Multi-tenant e-learning dashboard for managing English classes, schedules, attendance and student progress with rich calendar + analytics.
highlights: Role: Senior Front-End Engineer (architecture & UI system)
Modular Angular 13 codebase with lazy-loaded feature modules
Scheduling & class management with real-time updates
Student progress tracking & performance dashboards
FullCalendar integration for sessions & events
Design system theming using SCSS + Angular Material overrides
Accessibility & keyboard navigable admin workflows

title: SAIP.gov.sa – SaaS & Landing Experience Platform
description: Government-scale SaaS + marketing experience for intellectual property services: modular landing pages, real-time status updates, and secure user flows.
highlights: Role: Front-End Engineer delivering SaaS & marketing surfaces
Modular landing page sections with CMS-driven content blocks
Real-time filing / request status updates via WebSockets
Performance tuning (Core Web Vitals & bundle splitting)
Accessible UI components aligned with WCAG 2.1 AA
Incremental static regeneration & edge caching strategy
Analytics + event instrumentation for conversion funnels

title: SAIP IPR Statistics – Internal Analytics Micro‑Frontend
description: Micro‑frontend analytics dashboard for intellectual property rights examiners providing real-time workload metrics, examination throughput, and decision pipeline insights.
highlights: Role: Front-End Engineer implementing micro‑frontend analytics module
Webpack Module Federation integration inside a larger SAIP platform shell
Real-time statistics for examiner workload & processing latency
Redux Toolkit + RTK Query for normalized caching & auto-refetch policies
Progressive data hydration with optimistic UI for status updates
SCSS modular architecture with variable-driven theming
Performance focus: memoized selectors & bundle partitioning

title: Deal360 – Real Estate Marketplace & 360° Virtual Tours
description: Full-featured real estate marketplace platform enabling property discovery, interactive 360° virtual tours, map-based exploration, and authenticated user management.
highlights: Role: Front-End Engineer delivering core marketplace flows
Google Maps API integration with clustered markers & geo filters
360° property media viewer (panoramic/virtual tour support)
Secure auth & session management via Firebase
Redux state architecture with normalized entities & caching
Responsive SCSS + Bootstrap layout system
Optimized Axios data layer with request interception & error handling

title: Auctions – SaaS Real-Time Auction Marketplace
description: Real-time auction SaaS enabling secure bidding, listing workflows, role-based dashboards, and analytics insight for administrators and sellers.
highlights: Role: Front-End Engineer implementing real-time bidding & dashboards
WebSocket-driven live bidding updates & countdown timers
NextAuth secure authentication + role-based access (admin / seller / bidder)
ApexCharts analytics dashboards: revenue, bid velocity, engagement
Multi-step listing creation wizard with validation & draft persistence
Hybrid UI: Ant Design components with Tailwind utility refinement
Server-side rendering + incremental static regeneration for SEO
Optimized bundle via code-splitting heavy chart & auth modules
